fullForm: Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology Entrance Examination
conductingBody: Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology (KIIT), Bhubaneswar
eligibility: Eligibility criteria vary by course. For B.Tech, candidates must have passed 10+2 or equivalent with at least 60% marks in Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics. For other courses, refer to the official brochure.

faqs.question: Can I request for re-evaluation of KIITEE result?
faqs.answer: No, Kalinga Institute of Industrial Technology will not entertain any request for re-evaluation/re-checking. The result once released by authorities will be considered as final.
